Text:
Damn description f'ed up and now wont let me edit. So here it is in it entirety:

Opie and Anthony 2010-07-19-O&A-CF64K-Incomplete
Sirius XM Satellite Radio Show
English, MP3
Spread the Virus!!

As the title states, this is not a complete copy. The boys went extra long today and through various circumstances there is not yet a full copy of today's show. If one surfaces, I will post it...eventually.


The kid comes through again!

Patched together from an external source, because I failed today. Missing the final couple minutes because they went over.

Stats:
Opie at Yankee Stadium, The disgusting summer heat, Other weekend stuff, Patrice O'Neal in-studio, The death penalty, Conspiracies!, More sports talk, Old timey racist ads, More Mel Gibson remixes? Movie talk, Randy Couture & Terry Crews in-studio

Original Upload by Inflammo. Thank you Inflammo for making my job easier, and getting out these early Up's!!



Anyone seen Goosey?
Thanks, last I saw Goose, he was going with Uncle Paul to help him find his lost dog....

I think your it.
Besides inflamo, I think you are the only           opie & anthony fan uploading. Much thanks by the way. Mother goose has not uploaded in like a month.

I guess goose has flown the coop.

A BOOOOOOOOO!

Thanks a lot Shauzien! I was thinking about another show that I've been looking for. It's the guitar hero Evan vs Danny episode. I forget the date so I'll look it up. If you have it please upload it. Thanks for todays up!

^^

Oh Chip!

Danny and Evan played Guitar Hero on Jan 8, 2009

http://oapedia.com/index.php/Evan

thanks djwhupass!
so it was jan 8th 2009. so if you or anyone has it I would sooo appreciate it. I love the unraveling during the show.
I will try and get Jan '09 up by this weekend at the latest.
how long was left before it cut of?
thank for the upload.really appreciate it.keep up the great work.tee hee

Thank you very much Shu!
You're fuckin' amazing!
The bay here won't let me upload the complete file, so go check out one of the alternatives. Kick ass torrents or demonoid.

Hey everybody! Heads up! I am going to stop using The Pirate Bay this weekend. This coming Friday July 23rd will be the last day I post OnA on the pirate bay. I'm not going to discuss this with anyone sooo.... Don't ask.

I'll post links to the other sites that I will continue posting on.
thanks for the heads up shu
hey, what time do you usually upload O and A at m8?

Hey tobu, I might have spoken too soon. I only seem to have about a third of January '09.  I recall having a hard drive crash a while back, now I see what I have lost.  I am busy looking for another source for the rest of the month, but it isn't looking too good. Also, the day in question, I don't have.  So, I'll continue trying to get a hold of it, but I don't think I will get it by this weekend. Sorry 'bout that.

Makaveli, I usually have the show up by 9AM PST. That is a good time to start checking.
no prob, thanks your doing a great job.appreciate it.

So, now I can't upload anything to the bay.
Nor can I post a link here.
Go to kickasstorrents, or demonoid.

Just added all shows from Jan 2009.  Get them here:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5704949
Oh, and thanks to Shuazian, Mothergoose and all the others who make it possible to listen to the show when we aren't near an XM.

One last thing, any other shows needed from when the boys were suspended after the Homeless Charlie bit I have, so feel free to ask, plus I have a bunch of older WNEW things on file I uploaded once before but I am not sure that torrent still exists.
No worries.  Cheers for the ups and look forward to the new site.
Thanks Thomas and Shu, your efforts make life tolerable =]
